text:
University of Minnesota
General Extension Division
Minneapolis 14
Radio Station KUOM
770 ON YOUR DIAL
October 16, 1953
Mr. frank Schooley
Station WILL
University of Illinois
Urbana, Illinois
Dear frank:
We have just dug out an August 11th statement from the University
National Bank of Minneapolis for the 1952 NAEB Convention account,
indicating a balance of $201.55.
Previous correspondence to you from Burton indicates that on
May 26, he sent you a check for $169.58 of this amount, and
asked what disposition you proposed for the remaining $31.90.
Judging from the August 11th statement, the May 26th check for
$169.58 has not yet been cashed by you. Also, what should be
done with the remaining $31.90?
Will hope to see you in Norman and bend an elbow or two.’
.best personal regards,
Northrop Dawson, Jr.
Acting Manager
NDJR/msp
Enc.—copy of 5/26 ltr.
